title: Acceleration of block projected up ramp

content.question: A block is projected up a frictionless plane with an initial speed vo. The plane is inclined 30Â° above the horizontal. What is the approximate acceleration of the block at the instant that it reaches its highest point on the inclined plane?

choices.label: It cannot be calculated without knowing the value of vo

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
